title: Everyday Blessings
description: When Aubrey McKaslin visited reclusivephotographer William Corey, she found a manwho had given up on life and faith. He saidhe was happy at his mountain retreat, butAubrey didn''t believe it for a minute. His eyessignaled a kindred soul, a man who sharedher love of art and the outdoors. Spendingtime together awakened deeper feelings inthem both, but could William trust in his faithand rise above his past?
author: Jillian Hart
